_description: ‘De festo sancti Petri apostoli quod dicitur in Cathedra’, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: SAint peter cristes apostil derein þis werld had grete powere…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And þare he dyed and went to blisþat way to wende oure lord us wis
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: De ffesto sancti petri apostoli quod dicitur in Cathedra (rubric, f. 145rb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Altenglische Legenden: Neue Folge.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 49-51.
